forum.content:
No more“I wanna/am looking for…learn English”.Stop discussing theory and just listen to a classic Rock N Roll
-Free Bird by Lynyrd Skynyrd.

The lyrics of this song are pretty easy to understand. It brings you back to 70s.

My favorite part is an amazing guitar solo during the rear part. It touches your heart of you're a pure Rock N Roll fan.

One of my American friends told me that the modern POP music is shit. I totally agree with him. Both he and I are out of style.
forum.title: Free Bird
